name: Chameleon
description: A single touched target blends into their surroundings, gaining 15 percent plus 1 percent per two caster levels concealment for 5 to 10 rounds.

upgrades.description: With Improved Chameleon, your Chameleon spell now confers 15 plus 1 percent per caster level concealment.
With Mass Chameleon, your Chameleon spell now affects all friendly targets within 3 hexes of the caster.
